Stop-Signal Task.Description: Stop-Signal Task which used food sitimuli that varied in energy density and portion size

block.Description: Block number for the task - the number does not correspond to conditions so should always follow sequence 1, 2, 3, 4

Levels.hED_lPort: high energy dense, large portion food stimuli
Levels.hED_sPort: high energy dense, small portion food stimuli
Levels.lED_lPort: low energy dense, large portion food stimuli
Levels.lED_sPort: low energy dense, small portion food stimuli

food_cond.Description: Indicates engery density condition for trial

port_cond.Description: Indicates portion size condition for trial

stim.Description: Indicates the location of the napkin, which is the go signal

reqSSD.Description: The intended stop signal delay time

correct.Description: Indicates the accuracy of the response

Levels.2: incorrect arrow pressed (left/right) on go trial

resp2.Description: Collects response of accidental/slipped second response

trueSSD.Description: Stop signal delay of presended stop signal
